definition: Dawu county in Xiaogan 孝感[Xiao4 gan3], Hubei
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
to comprehend/to apprehend/to become aware
to suddenly realize/to suddenly see the light
to achieve supreme enlightenment or nirvana (Buddhism)
Dawu county in Xiaogan 孝感[Xiao4 gan3], Hubei

sentences.english: And we realized, you know, they could be influencing each other.
sentences.chinese: 然后我们就恍然大悟，这两者之间可以相互影响。

sentences.english: I have recently been disabused of this notion.
sentences.chinese: 而最近我对这种观念恍然大悟。

sentences.english: Demeter came, but it was too late.
sentences.chinese: 得墨忒尔恍然大悟，但为时已晚。

sentences.english: Enlightenment may still be far away, but the wind is now with your sail.
sentences.chinese: 大觉大悟虽然还离得很远，顺风已吹满了你的主帆。

sentences.english: It just dawned on me you lost a son.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你失去了你的儿子，这使我大彻大悟。

sentences.english: There was a round of forehead slaps from the other Team-members.
sentences.chinese: 其他的团队成员恍然大悟。

sentences.english: Listen to her words everyone suddenly enlighted, turns out to be a misunderstanding.
sentences.chinese: 听了她的话大家恍然大悟，原来是一场误会。

sentences.english: I am suddenly enlighted, the human not only wants to go on living, but also good work crisper.
sentences.chinese: 我恍然大悟，人不仅要活下去，还好活得更爽些。

sentences.english: Even more, you led these sentient beings to the Path of Complete Enlightment.
sentences.chinese: 还有，你带领有情众生走水上大澈大悟之道。

sentences.english: The importance of bionics suddenly hits you .
sentences.chinese: 你就会对仿生学的重要性恍然大悟。

sentences.english: With a great "ah ha!" we return to our Amazon spokeswoman.
sentences.chinese: 带着恍然大悟，我们回来看亚马逊的女发言人。

sentences.english: Mother said it is autumn, I recognized suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈说已经立秋，我也恍然大悟。

sentences.english: His friend suddenly saw the light and then his illness was cured right off.
sentences.chinese: 朋友恍然大悟，一直治不好的重病一下子就好了。

sentences.english: Mr. Wong's speech about U.S./ China policy seemed to be an eye opener.
sentences.chinese: 王先生的中美政策讲演使人恍然大悟。

sentences.english: The Huo mulberry also set up for suddenly realize a location to nod.
sentences.chinese: 霍桑也装作恍然大悟地点了点头。

definition: a flash of realization/the truth in a flash/a moment of enlightenment (usually Buddhist)
suddenly and completely (realize, change one's strategy etc)
to achieve supreme enlightenment or nirvana (Buddhism)
fully aware/to recognize fully
to suddenly realize/to suddenly see the light
as if melting
lit. to anoint your head with the purest cream (idiom); fig. to enlighten people with perfect wisdom/flawless Buddhist teaching
to become enlightened (Buddhism)
Zhushan county in Shiyan 十堰[Shi2 yan4], Hubei/Zhushan or Chushan town in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
murky darkness suddenly opens (idiom); a sudden flash of insight and all is clear
Yingshan county in Huanggang 黃岡|黄冈[Huang2 gang1], Hubei
Gucheng county in Xiangfan 襄樊[Xiang1 fan2], Hubei

to comprehend/to apprehend/to become aware
abbr. for 五峰土家族自治縣|五峰土家族自治县[Wu3 feng1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4], Wufeng Tujia Autonomous County in Hubei/Wufeng township in Hsinchu County 新竹縣|新竹县[Xin1 zhu2 Xian4], northwest Taiwan
